title.rendered: Hi, I’m Dragan, Senior FrontEnd Developer

content.rendered:
Clean Coder / Creative Designer. HTML5, CSS3, JS, jQuery master. Cutting edge FrontEnd developer. Teacher and Activist.

Experienced ReactJS / Magento / WordPress / Joomla / Demandware / Hybris FrontEnd developer.
As a professional with more than eight years of experience I have a background of successfully developing a websites layout, usability and appearance in latest HTML5 and CSS3 techniques with slick JavaScript functionality.
Completely committed to Responsive design, with passion to explore new tools (like Angular, MEAN stack, Ember) and to upgrade ‘old’ ones, like ReactJS, Sass, Yeoman, Grunt, Bootstrap.
I have been working on various platforms, mostly for e-commerce solutions. I’m currently Senior FrontEnd developer on large enterprise projects. In the past I’ve worked with WordPress and Joomla, and on several projects with Ruby on Rails and CodeIgniter.
I’m used to Agile environment, using Git (GitLab and Bitbucket), with bug tracking systems like Jira and Redmine.
Although not my primary field, I’m always trying to dive deeper in back-end languages: PHP, Java, MySQL, Ruby.

excerpt.rendered: Clean Coder / Creative Designer. HTML5, CSS3, JS, jQuery master. Cutting edge FrontEnd developer. Teacher and Activist.
